posts.post_content: This (and maybe Lorthos) is why [Quest for Ula's Temple](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Quest for Ula's Temple) was printed. Use [Urborg, Tomb of Yawgmoth](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Urborg, Tomb of Yawgmoth) to turn your opponents lands into Swamps and then steal stuff while bashing them senseless. You could also use [Bazaar Trader](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Bazaar Trader) to give them a Swamp or Island.
posts.html:
